ValidationRule.description: The expected end or actual end date cannot be less than the Project start date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( YEAR(EndDate__c)< YEAR(StartDate__c), AND( DAY(EndDate__c) < DAY(StartDate__c) , MONTH(EndDate__c)= MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDate__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ), AND( MONTH(EndDate__c)< MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDate__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ), YEAR(EndDateReal__c)< YEAR(StartDate__c), AND( DAY(EndDateReal__c) < DAY(StartDate__c) , MONTH(EndDateReal__c)= MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDateReal__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ), AND( MONTH(EndDateReal__c)< MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDateReal__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The expected end or actual end date cannot be less than the Project start date.
